caption:
“God is closer than your own breath.”

Reflection:
The divine dwells not in distance but in nearness. Each inhale is a reminder of presence.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that we live within God’s heartbeat. Faith is not pursuit but recognition — discovering the Holy already here.
